en.name: Ivan Shtarbanov
en.briefIntro: Hello, my name is Ivan, I am 26 years old and I am a certified front-end web developer. I have hands-on experience with many front-end, back-end and other technologies. I am striving to become a developer with good fundamentals and good coding style.
en.thisWebsite: You can browse through projects I've worked on, and you can also see rough estimations of my experience / skill levels.
